column4: Ah. So you have finally returned.

column3:
マスターソードの力を余さず使いこなせる
肉体と精神力を主は手に入れた…
column4:
Your mind, body, and soul are now
ready to wield the Master Sword
at its full potential.

column3: じつに見事な成長じゃ！

これで主は晴れて その剣の主となった
剣が発する聖なる輝きが良く似合うておる
column4:
Now you are truly one with that sword
of yours. I must say, its sacred glow
suits you well.

column3: 儂は ここから主の道行を見守ろう…
column4:
As ever, I shall watch over your journey
from here...

column3:
おそらく ハイラルの姫巫女も
主の成長を祝福しておるはずじゃ…
column4:
I am certain Hyrule's princess is pleased
with your accomplishment as well...
